meanings.definition: The essential or characteristic customs and conventions of a community.
meanings.sent1: In our town, the mores dictate that everyone attends the annual festival.
meanings.sent2: Respecting elders is a part of the mores in many cultures.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see Bob trying to break the mores by wearing a costume to work.
meanings.sent4: The mores of society act like invisible threads guiding our behavior.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the mores of different societies can be fascinating.

meanings.definition: The moral attitudes and fixed customs of a particular group.
meanings.sent1: The mores of the tribe emphasized honesty and loyalty.
meanings.sent2: Breaking the mores of a community can lead to social consequences.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see Sarah's attempt to challenge the mores by eating dessert before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The mores of the organization were so ingrained that even new members quickly adopted them.
meanings.sent5: The mores of a society can evolve over time.
